name: Sporty Date - U + 1
description:
Sporty Date! 💖⚽🏀🎾 
Grab your PLUS ONE & get ready for 2 hours of pure action! ⚡ Start with football drills, then switch it up with pickleball & padel! ✨ 
Agenda: 
🕠 5:30 PM – Arrival 
⚽ 6-6:45 PM – Fun doubles drills on the football pitch 
🎾 6:45-8 PM – All sports open for trial (pickleball, padel, football!) 
🎁 Little goodies for everyone after! 
What to carry: 
• Your +1 (duhh!) 
• sports clothes 
• sports shoes/trainers (not runnning shoes!) 
• Football shoes (if you have, if you don’t, sports shoes are good enough) 
• water bottle 
  
Your +1 can be anyone over 12—sister, brother, GF, BF, mum… bring a buddy & make it a Valentine’s weekend to remember! 💃🕺 
All are welcome! Sign up now! 🔥 
For any queries, contact: Vaibhavi - 9886520914

location.name: Game Theory
location.address: 2nd Main Rd,  Guru Raghavendra Nagar,  Elita Promenade,  Phase 7,  J. P. Nagar,  Kothnur,  Karnataka 560078

name: Dance Party with Jagriti
description:
Looking to enjoy your Sunday while still getting a great workout in? Join us at this 1 hour Dance Party with Jagriti vibing to all the HITS in our cutest fits! 
Date: 23rd Feb 2025, Sunday 
Time: 9-10 am (Please arrive at the studio by 8.45 am) 
Venue: Dhurii Academy of Arts, Domlur 
*Be sure to bring a water bottle to stay hydrated!

location.name: Dhurii Academy of Arts
location.address: Domlur, 13,  3rd Floor,  Patel Ram Reddy Rd,  Krishna Reddy Layout,  Amarjyoti Layout,  Domlur,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560071

name: Pickleballin' Queens Cup - Singles | Intermediate to Advance
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/pickleball/Pickleballin' Queens Cup - Singles | Intermediate to Advance
description:
Women-Only Pickleball Tournament 
ARRIVAL TIME: 9:15AM 
📅 Date: Sunday, February 23 
⏰ Time: 10:00 AM 
📍 Venue: GoRally, Indiranagar 
Tournament Category: Singles, Intermediate to Advance 
Tournament Format 
1.⁠ ⁠Round Robin Stage: 
•⁠  ⁠3-4 teams per group 
•⁠  ⁠Each team plays against every other team in their group 
2.⁠ ⁠Knockout Stage: 
•⁠  ⁠The top 2 teams from each group advance to the Quarterfinals 
•⁠  ⁠Winners move on to the Semifinals 
•⁠  ⁠Finalists compete for the championship 
Match Format: 
•⁠  ⁠One set played to 11 service points 
•⁠  ⁠If the score reaches 10-10, a golden point decides the winner 
Facilities & Refreshments 
🏃‍♀️ Stay energized at the Kenko Health Café & Coffee Bar at the venue 
🚿 Amenities available: Loos, showers, and changing rooms 
🚗 Parking: Ample space available

location.name: GoRally
location.address: Indiranagar, Exit Road,  No 52 MSIL Building,  Old Airport Rd,  near Blue Dart,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560017

name: Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate Play Zone
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/badminton/Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate Play Zone
description:
Badminton for Beginners & Intermediate! 
Whether you’re picking up a racket for the first time or looking to improve your game, our Beginner & Intermediate Badminton sessions are designed to help you build confidence, refine your technique, and have a great time on the court. You’ll get the chance to learn through drills, practice sessions, and friendly matches, making every game both a learning experience and a whole lot of fun. sessions are 120mins long. 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes and non-marking shoes 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of entusiasm to play :) See you on the court sisters! 
For any further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914
